openstack_networking_secgroup_v2.description: Manages a V2 Neutron security group resource within OpenStack.

region.description: The region in which to obtain the V2 networking client.

name.description: A unique name for the security group.

description.description: A unique name for the security group.

tenant_id.description: The owner of the security group. Required if admin

delete_default_rules.description: Whether or not to delete the default

tags.description: A set of string tags for the security group.
